AttackerCapabilities: Knowledge of XXE (XML External Entity) attacks

Steps.Description: Craft a payload to exploit the XXE vulnerability.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker is trying to exploit the XXE vulnerability in the web application to read files on the server.
StepDetails.Action: Craft an XML payload that includes the XXE payload.
StepDetails.Result: The server reflects the response, allowing the attacker to read files on the server.
